text: Pavel Deyev (1 January 1942 - 2 January 2009) was a Soviet equestrian. He competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics and the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Russian male equestrians Category:Soviet male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the Soviet Union Category:Equestrians at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:People from Rostov
title: Pavel Deyev
